description: This is the CloudTrail event generated when you request a password recovery.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: An attacker might use the password recovery process to lock out legitimate users by changing the password, effectively removing their access.
If there is a vulnerability in the password recovery mechanism of a public-facing application (such as the AWS console), an attacker might exploit this to gain unauthorized access.
The password recovery process could be manipulated or exploited to gain access to credentials, especially if the attacker can intercept or redirect the recovery process.

incidents.description: Disclosure of Security Incidents on imToken

securityImplications: Attackers might start a password recovery process to steal AWS access if they have compromised the email of the user.
